Auth.pageDescription: Login or create a free account to start using Zoonk.
Auth.title: Sign in or create an account
Auth.subtitle: Continue with your email or a social account
Auth.terms: By clicking on Continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
Auth.otpSubtitle: Enter the code we sent to {email}:
Auth.otpError: The code you entered is incorrect. Please try again or contact hello@zoonk.com
Auth.errorSigningIn: There was an error signing you in. Please try again or contact hello@zoonk.com

OTP.subject: Your Zoonk sign-in code
OTP.intro: This is your one-time passcode to sign in to Zoonk:
OTP.expiry: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
OTP.ignore: If you did not request this code, you can safely ignore this email.
